summary:
**South Park** is an American animated TV show created by Trey Parker and Matt Stone. It's about four boys—Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny—and their adventures in the town of South Park, Colorado. The show is known for its bad language and weird humor that makes fun of lots of things.

It started as short films in 1992 and 1995 and became a full series in 1997. There have been over 300 episodes, and it's still going strong. South Park has won many awards and is considered one of the best TV shows ever. There's also a successful movie based on the series.
title: South Park
